channel.title: Kaiju Pics
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Kaiju Pics"

item.title: Kaiju Pics
item.content:encoded:
I updated all the pics for the new kaiju-kage.

For reference, any kaiju's picture (particularily, kaiju-kages') can be found by going to http://www.animecubed.com/billy/layout/nin/generic/<kaijuname>.jpg and typing in the kaiju's name in the place of <kaijuname>. Capital letters do matter.

If something about this could be added to the template for kaiju, that'd be great.

I also think that the cat picture () is a generic base, for any kaiju-kage who do not give the program a picture to upload.
Kaiju who have the generic:
DemonDream
Elda
TheShadow (changed to a different picture)
AzoJason (Presumably changed to a different picture, somewhere between edits 1 and 3)
Porque

TheShadow and AzoJason seem to have changed their kaiju pics from a base to a different pic, so I'll make the assumption that kaiju kage may still be able to edit their kaiju's avitar even after the kaiju is released. I know TheShadow did for sure, since I originally found and uploaded his generic pic, and then recently noticed that it changed. According the page history of AzoJason, the same thing happened to him.
